items.summary: Restore the file click behavior in the file browser so that clicking a file row reliably opens the existing FilePreviewModal for that file (as it worked in v0.3.86), without changing or breaking the currently working search behavior.

Update preview navigation to match the prior “gallery-style” behavior: when a preview is open, users can move to previous/next files within the current context (current folder, or current search results list when search is active) using UI controls and keyboard arrows.

Ensure the preview modal can handle all file types: provide in-browser viewers for images, videos, audio, PDFs/documents, and text; for any unsupported/unsafe file type, show a clear “Preview not available” state with a direct download action (no infinite loading).
For text-based file previews, ensure users can scroll both vertically and horizontally to view the entire content, using browser-native scrolling where possible.
Bump the app version to 0.3.88 everywhere it is surfaced in code/config (at minimum: frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts and backend/main.mo appVersion).
